title: Lakers Eliminated, Luka's Brilliance Bucks-Nets Preview
description:
Brian Windhorst, Tim MacMahon and Tim Bontemps discuss the Lakers’ getting eliminated by the Suns with a massive game from Devin Booker, what moves the Lakers can make next season, the Suns’ potential going forward, Denver impressing while shorthanded, the brilliance of Luka and preview Bucks-Nets.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: ESPN, NBA, Brian Windhorst
itunes:subtitle: The Hoop Collective: What Does The Lakers' Loss Mean For The Organization Going Forward? Also, Luka Is Brilliant
